description: my solution to FSOpen's phonebook exercises

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../phonebookApp_frontend && npm run build:ui
scripts.push:master: git add . && git commit -am "updated UI" && git push origin master
scripts.push:testing: git add . && git commit -m "testing" && git push origin err_tests
